title: Big Wreck - Ghosts[2014]
description:
Ghosts is the fourth studio album by Big Wreck. The album was announced on April 8, 2014, with the title track "Ghosts" being released as the album's lead single the same day.[1] At a length of nearly 70 minutes, it is Big Wreck's longest album to date. The album debuted at #5 on the Canadian Albums Chart,[2] selling 4,000 copies in its first week.[3]
